articles.description: A man was seen removing stickers from an MRT map on the train, leaving other commuters baffled. Stomp contributor A said he spotted the man on the North-South Line on Saturday (Feb 27), at around 7.30pm. The stickers are station names that had been pasted on …
articles.title: Commuters puzzled by man removing stickers from MRT map on train - AsiaOne
